Literature Review: The following 10 studies are selected based on their relevance to the research topic 'Magneto-Optical Properties of Noble Metal Nanostructures' and the provided keywords. These studies cover various aspects of plasmon-mediated magneto-optics, superatoms, spin-polarized emission, magnetic circular photoluminescence, and magnetic circular dichroism in noble metal nanostructures.

References.title: Plasmon-Enhanced Magneto-Optical Effects in Noble Metal Nanostructures

References.title: Magnetic Light: Controlling Photonic Spin and Orbital Angular Momentum with Metasurfaces

References.title: Spin-Orbit Coupling in Plasmonic Nanostructures: From Magnetic Metamaterials to Spin-Optical Devices
